SELECT 'NO' AS "COLUMN_NAME", '行号' AS ITEM_NAME, 1 AS ORDER_NO FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'PRODUCT_ID' AS "COLUMN_NAME", '货品编号' AS ITEM_NAME, 1 AS ORDER_NO FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'PRODUCT_NAME' AS "COLUMN_NAME", '货物品名' AS ITEM_NAME, 2 AS ORDER_NO FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'SPECIFICATION' AS "COLUMN_NAME", '货品规格' AS ITEM_NAME, 3 AS ORDER_NO FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'PRODUCT_CATEGORY_ID' AS "COLUMN_NAME", '货物类别' AS ITEM_NAME, 4 AS ORDER_NO FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'UNIT_CODE_ID' AS "COLUMN_NAME", '单位' AS ITEM_NAME, 5 AS ORDER_NO FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'UNIT_PRICE' AS "COLUMN_NAME", '进货价' AS ITEM_NAME, 6 AS ORDER_NO FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'UNIT_PRICE' AS "COLUMN_NAME", '平均进货价' AS ITEM_NAME, 7 AS ORDER_NO FROM DUAL
UNION ALL SELECT 'STO'||PSI.STORAGE_NO AS COLUMN_NAME, PSI.STORAGE_NAME AS ITEM_NAME, PSI.STORAGE_NO+8 AS ORDER_NO FROM PROSTOR_STORAGE_INFO PSI WHERE PSI.ACTIVITY = 1 AND PSI.CPNY_ID = #CPNY_ID#
ORDER BY ORDER_NO

sql.isNotEmpty: PS.SUPPLIER_NO IN ( SELECT PPOD.SUPPLIER_NO FROM PROSTOR_PURCHASE_ORDER_DETAIL PPOD WHERE PPOD.ACTIVITY = 1 AND PPOD.CPNY_ID = #CPNY_ID# AND PPOD.PURCHASE_ORDER_ID = #PURCHASE_ORDER_ID# )

PS.SUPPLIER_NO IN ( SELECT PPOD.SUPPLIER_NO FROM PROSTOR_PURCHASE_ORDER_DETAIL PPOD WHERE PPOD.ACTIVITY = 1 AND PPOD.CPNY_ID = #CPNY_ID# AND PPOD.PURCHASE_ORDER_ID = #pid# AND PPOD.QUANTITY > NVL(PPOD.INQUANTITY,0) )

sqlMap.select: SELECT PS.SUPPLIER_NO, PS.SUPPLIER_ID, PS.SUPPLIER_NAME FROM PROSTOR_SUPPLIER PS WHERE PS.ACTIVITY = 1 AND PS.CPNY_ID = #CPNY_ID#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO PROSTOR_INSTORAGE_INFO( INSTORAGE_NO, INSTORAGE_ID, PURCHASE_ORDER_ID, SUPPLIER_NO, CREATE_DATE, CREATED_BY, ACTIVITY, CPNY_ID, STATUS, IN_DATE ) VALUES( PROSTOR_INSTORAGE_INFO_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #INSTORAGE_ID#, #PURCHASE_ORDER_ID#, #SUPPLIER_NO#, SYSDATE, #CREATED_BY#, 1, #CPNY_ID#, #STATUS#, TO_DATE(#IN_DATE#,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE PROSTOR_INSTORAGE_INFO SET STATUS = #STATUS#, IN_DATE = TO_DATE(#IN_DATE#,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), UPDATED_BY = #UPDATED_BY#, UPDATE_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE INSTORAGE_ID = #INSTORAGE_ID# AND ACTIVITY = 1 AND CPNY_ID = #CPNY_ID#
sqlMap.select: SELECT INSTORAGE_ID, SUPPLIER_NO, TO_CHAR(NVL(IN_DATE,SYSDATE),'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS IN_DATE, NVL(PURCHASE_ORDER_ID,'null') PURCHASE_ORDER_ID FROM PROSTOR_INSTORAGE_INFO WHERE ACTIVITY = 1 AND STATUS = 2 AND CPNY_ID = #CPNY_ID#

SELECT PPO.PURCHASE_ORDER_NO PURCHASE_ORDER_NO, PPO.PURCHASE_ORDER_ID PURCHASE_ORDER_ID, TO_CHAR(PPO.PURCHASE_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') PURCHASE_DATE, HE.CHINESENAME ENAME, (SELECT COUNT(0) FROM PROSTOR_INSTORAGE_INFO PII WHERE PII.ACTIVITY = 1 AND PII.CPNY_ID = #CPNY_ID# AND PII.PURCHASE_ORDER_ID = PPO.PURCHASE_ORDER_ID) IN_COUNT FROM PROSTOR_PURCHASE_ORDER PPO, HR_EMPLOYEE HE WHERE PPO.EMPID = HE.EMPID(+) AND PPO.STATUS = 'PurchaseOrderState0' AND PPO.AFFIRM_FLAG = 'affirm1' AND PPO.ACTIVITY = 1 AND PPO.CPNY_ID = #CPNY_ID#
ORDER BY $sortname$ $sortorder$
ORDER BY PPO.PURCHASE_ORDER_ID
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PROSTOR_PURCHASE_ORDER PPO, HR_EMPLOYEE HE WHERE PPO.EMPID = HE.EMPID(+)

SELECT NVL(SUM(NVL(PPOD.QUANTITY,0) - NVL(PPOD.INQUANTITY,0)),0) QUANTTIY FROM PROSTOR_PURCHASE_ORDER_DETAIL PPOD WHERE PPOD.PURCHASE_ORDER_ID = #pid# AND PPOD.ACTIVITY = 1 AND PPOD.CPNY_ID = #CPNY_ID#

SELECT PPOD.PURCHASE_ORDER_ID PURCHASE_ORDER_ID, PPOD.PRODUCT_NO PRODUCT_NO, PP.PRODUCT_ID PRODUCT_ID, PP.PRODUCT_NAME PRODUCT_NAME, S.CODE_NAME, PPOD.SUPPLIER_NO SUPPLIER_NO, (PPOD.QUANTITY - NVL(PPOD.INQUANTITY,0)) QUANTITY FROM PROSTOR_PRODUCT PP, PROSTOR_PURCHASE_ORDER_DETAIL PPOD, SY_CODE S WHERE PPOD.PRODUCT_NO = PP.PRODUCT_NO(+) AND PPOD.QUANTITY > NVL(PPOD.INQUANTITY,0) AND PPOD.CPNY_ID = #CPNY_ID# AND PPOD.ACTIVITY = 1 AND PP.CPNY_ID = #CPNY_ID# AND PP.UNIT_CODE_ID = S.CODE_ID(+) AND PP.ACTIVITY = 1 AND PPOD.PURCHASE_ORDER_ID = #pid#

SELECT PII.INSTORAGE_NO, PII.INSTORAGE_ID, PII.PURCHASE_ORDER_ID, PII.SUPPLIER_NO, PS.SUPPLIER_NAME, TO_CHAR(PII.IN_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') IN_DATE, NVL2(PII.UPDATED_BY ,( SELECT HE.CHINESENAME FROM HR_EMPLOYEE HE WHERE HE.EMPID = PII.UPDATED_BY AND HE.ACTIVITY = 1 AND HE.CPNY_ID = #CPNY_ID# ),( SELECT HE.CHINESENAME FROM HR_EMPLOYEE HE WHERE HE.EMPID = PII.CREATED_BY AND HE.ACTIVITY = 1 AND HE.CPNY_ID = #CPNY_ID# )) ENAME, PII.STATUS, NVL( (SELECT SUM(PIP.QUANTITY) FROM PROSTOR_INSTORAGE_PRODUCT PIP WHERE PIP.ACTIVITY = 1 AND PIP.CPNY_ID = #CPNY_ID# AND PIP.INSTORAGE_ID = PII.INSTORAGE_ID),0 ) QUANTITY_SUM, NVL( (SELECT SUM(PIP.QUANTITY*PIP.UNIT_PRICE) FROM PROSTOR_INSTORAGE_PRODUCT PIP WHERE PIP.ACTIVITY = 1 AND PIP.CPNY_ID = #CPNY_ID# AND PIP.INSTORAGE_ID = PII.INSTORAGE_ID),0 ) PRICE_SUM FROM PROSTOR_INSTORAGE_INFO PII, PROSTOR_SUPPLIER PS WHERE PII.SUPPLIER_NO = PS.SUPPLIER_NO(+) AND PII.ACTIVITY = 1 AND PII.CPNY_ID = #CPNY_ID# AND PS.ACTIVITY = 1 AND PS.CPNY_ID = #CPNY_ID#
ORDER BY $sortname$ $sortorder$
ORDER BY PII.IN_DATE DESC

SELECT COUNT(PII.INSTORAGE_NO) FROM PROSTOR_INSTORAGE_INFO PII, PROSTOR_SUPPLIER PS WHERE PII.SUPPLIER_NO = PS.SUPPLIER_NO(+) AND PII.ACTIVITY = 1 AND PII.CPNY_ID = #CPNY_ID# AND PS.ACTIVITY = 1 AND PS.CPNY_ID = #CPNY_ID#

SELECT PIP.PRODUCT_NO, PIP.PRODUCT_ID, PIP.PRODUCT_NAME, PIP.SPECIFICATION, PIP.PRODUCT_NUM, PIP.PRODUCT_CAS, PIP.UNIT_NAME, PIP.UNIT_PRICE, PIP.QUANTITY, PIP.STORAGE_NAME, PIP.STOR_ADDR, PIP.QUANTITY*PIP.UNIT_PRICE SUMMONEY FROM PROSTOR_INSTORAGE_PRODUCT PIP WHERE PIP.ACTIVITY = 1 AND PIP.CPNY_ID = #CPNY_ID# AND PIP.INSTORAGE_ID = #INSTORAGE_ID#
SELECT COUNT(0) FROM PROSTOR_INSTORAGE_PRODUCT PIP WHERE PIP.ACTIVITY = 1 AND PIP.CPNY_ID = #CPNY_ID# AND PIP.INSTORAGE_ID = #INSTORAGE_ID#

SELECT PII.INSTORAGE_NO, PII.INSTORAGE_ID, PII.PURCHASE_ORDER_ID, PS.SUPPLIER_NAME, TO_CHAR(PII.IN_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') IN_DATE, NVL2(PII.UPDATED_BY ,( SELECT HE.CHINESENAME FROM HR_EMPLOYEE HE WHERE HE.EMPID = PII.UPDATED_BY AND HE.ACTIVITY = 1 AND HE.CPNY_ID = #CPNY_ID# ),( SELECT HE.CHINESENAME FROM HR_EMPLOYEE HE WHERE HE.EMPID = PII.CREATED_BY AND HE.ACTIVITY = 1 AND HE.CPNY_ID = #CPNY_ID# )) ENAME, PII.STATUS, NVL( (SELECT SUM(PIP.QUANTITY) FROM PROSTOR_INSTORAGE_PRODUCT PIP WHERE PIP.ACTIVITY = 1 AND PIP.CPNY_ID = #CPNY_ID# AND PIP.INSTORAGE_ID = PII.INSTORAGE_ID),0 ) QUANTITY_SUM, NVL( (SELECT SUM(PIP.QUANTITY*PIP.UNIT_PRICE) FROM PROSTOR_INSTORAGE_PRODUCT PIP WHERE PIP.ACTIVITY = 1 AND PIP.CPNY_ID = #CPNY_ID# AND PIP.INSTORAGE_ID = PII.INSTORAGE_ID),0 ) PRICE_SUM, HC.CPNY_NAME, HC.CPNY_ADDR, HC.CPNY_TEL_NO FROM PROSTOR_INSTORAGE_INFO PII, PROSTOR_SUPPLIER PS, HR_COMPANY HC WHERE PII.INSTORAGE_ID = #INSTORAGE_ID# AND PII.SUPPLIER_NO = PS.SUPPLIER_NO(+) AND PII.ACTIVITY = 1 AND PII.CPNY_ID = #CPNY_ID# AND PS.ACTIVITY = 1 AND PS.CPNY_ID = #CPNY_ID# AND HC.CPNY_ID = #CPNY_ID#

SELECT PII.INSTORAGE_ID, TO_CHAR(PII.IN_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi') IN_DATE, PS.SUPPLIER_NAME, PP.PRODUCT_ID, PP.PRODUCT_NAME, PIP.SPECIFICATION, PIP.UNIT_NAME, PIP.QUANTITY, PIP.UNIT_PRICE, PIP.STORAGE_NAME FROM PROSTOR_INSTORAGE_INFO PII, PROSTOR_INSTORAGE_PRODUCT PIP, PROSTOR_SUPPLIER PS, PROSTOR_PRODUCT PP WHERE PII.INSTORAGE_ID = PIP.INSTORAGE_ID(+) AND PII.SUPPLIER_NO = PS.SUPPLIER_NO(+) AND PIP.PRODUCT_NO = PP.PRODUCT_NO(+) AND PII.ACTIVITY = 1 AND PII.CPNY_ID = #CPNY_ID#
PII.IN_DATE >= TO_DATE(#FROM_DATE#,'YYYY-MM-DD')
PII.IN_DATE <= TO_DATE(#END_DATE#,'YYYY-MM-DD')+1
ORDER BY PII.INSTORAGE_ID
